post:
As this is our first offer here, we are offering 50% off all of our Web Hosting and KVM VPS plans with a reoccurring lifetime promotion! 

Servers Galore is fully Australian owned and operated providing high-quality services at competitive prices. 

Check out our Trustpilot reviews [https://au.trustpilot.com/review/serversgalore.com.au](https://au.trustpilot.com/review/serversgalore.com.au "https://au.trustpilot.com/review/serversgalore.com.au")

Our Web Hosting includes the following:
*CloudLinux
*cPanel
*NVMe SSDs in RAID
*Latest Intel CPUs
*Gigabit Connection
*Unlimited Bandwidth
*Softaculous
*JetBackup
*Daily Backups - 14 Day Retention 
*Node.js
*Python
*Ruby on Rails
*Pearl
*SSL Certificate Included
*Free Migration
*24/7 Australian Support
*Awstats/Webalizer
